title: DC'ing from Ranked. Net is fine. Server issue?
body: Anybody else having this issue? Two others from the game I was in dropped before me.

replies.body:
Same here, it's not a problem on the users' end.

It happened some time around patch 7.13 and it's still there.
I tried the following:

- Starting client as administrator
- Compatibility Mode
- Low-spec Mode
- Followed the connection guide but it STILL happens on fiber, dsl and 4G, EVEN IN THE PRACTICE TOOL.
- Full repair
- Uninstall / Reinstall

Nothing works, because there's a damn issue in the code. Please stop answering with the standard "Connection guide" link.
This is a serious problem.
Just happened to me, every other site is working fine but I can't reconnect.
I noticed a lot of ISP issues last night, especially for those in the east coast.  Sorry that this impacted your ranked game.  :(
